headline: Is Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO) Pricing Reflect Its Recent Share Pullback And DCF Estimate
summary: If you are wondering whether Thermo Fisher Scientific's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article walks through that question step by step. The stock last closed at US$578.61, with returns of a 7.6% decline over 7 days, 2.3% decline over 30 days, 2.3% decline year to date, 2.9% decline over 1 year, 0.7% decline over 3 years and 19.0% over 5 years, which may have caught the eye of investors thinking about risk and entry points.
